verbs.description: The number of job openings [V: has] been rising since mid-2009 , contrary to President Donald Trump ’s boast that under his stewardship “ all of a sudden , we have jobs . ”
The number of job openings has [V: been] rising since mid-2009 , contrary to President Donald Trump ’s boast that under his stewardship “ all of a sudden , we have jobs . ”

[ARG1: The number of job openings] has been [V: rising] [ARGM-TMP: since mid-2009] , [ARGM-ADV: contrary to President Donald Trump ’s boast that under his stewardship “ all of a sudden , we have jobs] . ”

The number of job openings has been rising since mid-2009 , contrary to President Donald Trump ’s boast that [ARGM-LOC: under his stewardship] “ [ARGM-TMP: all of a sudden] , [ARG0: we] [V: have] [ARG1: jobs] . ”
